content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetMetrics path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/monitors/{monitor_id}/metrics content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name monitorid
desc a monitor id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name startdate
desc the start date of the time range to look for metrics
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc the end date of the time range to look for metrics
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name pops
desc a list of point of presence to retrieve metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name metrics
desc a list of metrics to retrieve
in query
required false
schema
type arr
items
type str
name aggregation
in query
required false

type str
default default

in query
required false

type str
default none

in query
required false

type str
default defaultgranularity
name granularityfunction
